name: Square Realty Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Company for Banking and Trusts
name_abbreviation: Square Realty Co. v. Pennsylvania Co. for Banking & Trusts

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
parties: Square Realty Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Company for Banking and Trusts.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Parry.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Edmund R. Finegan, Thomas P. Mikell and Saul, Ewing, Remick & Saul, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Square Realty Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Company for Banking and Trusts.
Submitted January 11, 1952.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
Edward W. Furia and Furia & DiCintio, for appellant.
March 24, 1952:
Edmund R. Finegan, Thomas P. Mikell and Saul, Ewing, Remick & Saul, for appellee.
